start: It's time to kick ass and chew bubble gum.
retreat: Ah come on! I haven't got all the fun yet.
engaged: Guns, check! Engine, check! Enemies to shoot, check!
need_help: I'm outnumbered, commander. Which is PERFECT! Power all the weapons!
hull_90: Nothing happened here! What? Hull breach?
hull_50: The other half won't be so easy!
hull_30: I'm in hyper-tension! Not the disease, you know.
Now this is interesting! Hey, someone turn that siren off.
overload: Fix that flux system already! I can't get the guns shooting!
death: Darn! I thought I could make it.
victory: Is it all you've got there!
